test.name: Ensure the VRF reachability between PE routers

kw.name: Ensure the VRF reachability between PE routers
Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

arguments.arg: Verify VRF ping from PE router R2 to Host

kw.name: Run Keyword And Continue On Failure
kw.doc: Runs the keyword and continues execution even if a failure occurs.

kw.name: Ping Vrf
kw.msg:
ping vrf vrf1 192.168.80.20
Type escape sequence to abort. Sending 5, 100-byte ICMP Echos to 192.168.80.20, timeout is 2 seconds: .!!!! Success rate is 80 percent (4/5), round-trip min/avg/max = 20/285/1060 ms R7#

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

arguments.arg: Unable to reach Host from VRF1

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

arguments.arg: Verify VRF ping from PE router R3 to Host

kw.name: Run Keyword And Continue On Failure
kw.doc: Runs the keyword and continues execution even if a failure occurs.

kw.name: Ping Vrf
kw.msg:
ping vrf vrf1 192.168.80.20
Type escape sequence to abort. Sending 5, 100-byte ICMP Echos to 192.168.80.20, timeout is 2 seconds: !!!!! Success rate is 100 percent (5/5), round-trip min/avg/max = 16/25/40 ms R8#

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

arguments.arg: Unable to reach Host from VRF1
